column5: Where can I get Jiffy model 30 auger parts in Ontario? Thanks Wayne
what parts?????  never needed any parts for my old 10" other than spare spark plug and blades. Same with my newer 2 hp 8" model.
Any small engine repair shop should be able to get parts.
Like Tjsa said, what parts do you need? If it is a carb kit I might have one here. Call me 705-328-0577
The two small springs that hold the clutch in place.Both broke.Need a place where I can order parts direct.I have it apart,I can repair it myself just have to find where to order from.

Probably are places that other guys can steer you to, but why not e-mail Jiffy directly. I did years ago looking for a place to buy some stickers to put on my custom made auger box, and they sent me almost a dozen stickers free of charge. Same thing happened when I e-mailed Daiwa direct about bail springs for a reel of theirs I had 4 of, not complaining, just looking for a retailer or authorized maintenance shop in Ontario. They sent me 3 replacement bail springs for free.  Worth a shot, or an e-mail.
